name: Swift Fox
description:
Swift Fox is a game where you are fox in search of food in a snowy night. Luckily, there's a chicken coop near you, but be careful with the farmer. Use the covers to move around without getting caught, but don't linger in the same cover for too long. The snow in the covers melt and the farmer will automatically spot you. This game includes 5 levels, each one with a higher difficulty level than the others!

How To Play:

Meet Maroon Macaroon, our cute and hungry fox!
